text: This study was conducted at a regional hospital in Vhembe district in Limpopo Province , South Africa between 2014 and 2015 . The hospital is a public healthcare facility situated in Thohoyandou , Limpopo province of South Africa . It is the only regional hospital in Vhembe district of Limpopo province with two TB wards and 20 beds . It is a referral hospital for seven community hospitals in Vhembe district . According to Wolmarans and Asia [ 11 ] , the total population is about 1 , 294 , 722 , comprising of Vha - venda , Va - tsonga , and Sotho speaking people .
